Algebra 2 - How to determine if a table of a function is an example of direct variation

\begin{array}{|c|c|}\n\hline x & y \\\n\hline 2 & 14 \\\n\hline 3 & 21 \\\n\hline 5 & 35 \\\n\hline\n\end{array}[imath]\hline x & y [/imath] [imath]\hline 2 & 14 [/imath] [imath]\hline 3 & 21 [/imath] [imath]\hline 5 & 35 [/imath] [imath]\hline[/imath]
